DOC.brief_title: Antimicrobial Susceptibility Patterns N. Gonorrhea Isolates Era Quinolone Resistance
DOC.detailed_description: Until recently , fluoroquinolones ( ofloxacin , ciprofloxacin , levofloxacin ) first line oral agent empiric treatment gonorrhea . The prevalence quinolone resistant Neisseria gonorrheae ( QRNG ) rise since 2000 . In 2006 , CDC update guideline include recommendation use quinolones treatment Neisseria gonorrheae . Ceftriaxone ( available intravenous intramuscular route ) name first line treatment urogenital pharyngeal disease . Availability , United States , two CDC recommend agent cefixime ( oral ) spectinomycin ( IM ) nonexistent . At time , little data in-vitro ( laboratory test ) susceptibility antibiotic gonorrhea , particularly oral drug . The purpose study collect specimen gonorrhea non-invasive swab manner men symptomatic urethral discharge laboratory sensitivity test wide array antibiotic agent . Specific Aims : To perform laboratory sensitivity test survey antibiotic agent Neisseria gonorrhea isolate men symptomatic urethritis see Duval County STD clinic .
DOC.criteria: Men age 18 80 year old suspect urethral gonorrhea symptom gram stain smear Patients le 18 year old great 80 year old Inability give inform consent
